property.name: mediadisplayblurb
property.value: Demonstrating CPR with an interpreter, Comoros

note.text: Because you rely on interpreters for specialized knowledge, it's both difficult and important to verify their work. However, there are several proven methods for evaluating local interpreters.

Another interpreter can observe and verify the interpreter's work. A second way of evaluating interpreters is to observe them working with another member of your team, to see their skills and methods from another vantage point. Finally, if possible, record a conversation and have it checked by a speaker of the language.
